structure.unit: PHYSICIANS, OSTEOPATHS, PODIATRISTS, AND RELATED MEDICAL PRACTITIONERS

law.catch_line: Mercy killing not condoned, authorized, or approved.
law.text: KRS 311.621 to 311.643 shall not be construed to condone, authorize, or approve mercy killing or euthanasia, or to permit any affirmative or deliberate act to end life other than to permit the natural process of dying.
law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 235, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1994.
